Welcome from ZeroXDBMS.sh

Here is the commands needs to be installed before running ZeroXDBMS.sh script:

----- For CentOS & RedHat --------------

rpm -Uvh https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-6.noarch.rpm
yum install figlet

yum install newt


------ For Ubuntu -------------

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install figlet

sudo apt-get install whiptail
